game.name: Pachincro
game.shortDescription: An action-packed pachinko–plinko incremental game with a massive skill tree and tons of upgrades. Drop balls, stack multipliers, unlock new abilities, watch the chaos scale into pure satisfaction, all while trying to defeat the boss and staying alive
game.shortDescriptionEn: An action-packed pachinko–plinko incremental game with a massive skill tree and tons of upgrades. Drop balls, stack multipliers, unlock new abilities, watch the chaos scale into pure satisfaction, all while trying to defeat the boss and staying alive
